duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop Standard Operating Procedures for new manufacturing processes and equipment.
Apply educational background and engineering experience to the formulation, design, and development of new products and processes.
Organize manufacturing trials to evaluate new ideas based on scientific, engineering, and statistical principles.
Manage multiple projects and meet required deadlines.
Track manufacturing process data and report on key performance indicators.
Assist Sales and Marketing on their evaluation of potential customers’ products and processes and make recommendations for new or existing products.
Participate with personnel from R&D and other departments to perform projects requiring cross-functional coordination.
Supervise one or more technicians and machine operators.
Reports to the Vice President, R&D.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in relevant Engineering or Science discipline (Master's preferred)
5 years of experience in a relevant manufacturing environment
